snippet: The governor of Washington showed her admirable political evolution when she urged her state to legalize same-sex marriage.
abstract: Editorial applauds Washington Gov Christine Gregoire for urging her state to legalize same-sex marriage; notes that move is the culmination of Gregoire's eight-year evolution from wariness of issue to its endorsement.
lead_paragraph: The governor of Washington showed her admirable political evolution when she urged her state to legalize same-sex marriage.

headline.seo: Gov. Gregoire Comes Around on Same-Sex Marriage

keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
keywords.name: subject
